description: Sovereign single source of truth for all 119 3A Automation services

automations.semantic_description: Synchronizes lead data from Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram) lead forms directly into Shopify customer records. Use this for Meta-based acquisition workflows.

automations.note: Previously planned as n8n workflow, now manual integration

automations.semantic_description: Scrapes local business data from Google Maps based on query and location. Use this for local B2B lead generation or competitive research in a specific area.
Extracts professional profiles from LinkedIn based on search criteria. Essential for B2B outreach and hiring intelligence.
